Title: Relates to the definition of small business for the purposes of minority and women-owned business enterprises
Summary: Provides that "small business" for the purposes of minority and women-owned business enterprises shall mean a business which has a significant business presence in the state, is independently owned and operated, not dominant in its field and employs, based on its industry, a certain number of persons as determined by the director, but not to exceed three hundred except for industries otherwise specified by the small business size standards pursuant to 13 CFR 121.201 which shall be determined by the size standard in number of employees.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to the definition of small business
